converse.line: Tell me. How rich do you think I am?
No! Don't be ridiculous! I am much richer than the average commoner.
Hmm. Close, but not quite an accurate description of my vast wealth.
So rich you could buy one of the moons.
Preciously! But, you know I would never do that, for the good of the people.
I am so rich! I have so much money; I don't know what to do with it all! I own every invention and luxury.
Why don't you spread the wealth, then and help some other people.
That's a marvelous idea! You'll be the first to receive my grace of money.
